name: eServGlobal
overview: eServGlobal Limited, through its subsidiaries, develops and implements convergent charging and rating, mobile payment, network services, and messaging products for operators in mobile, fixed, and IMS network environments. The company operates in four segments: IMS/NGN, ISP, Fixed-Mobile Convergence, and Mobile. The IMS/NGN segmentâ€™s solutions are based on a common service platform enabling legacy networks to IMS/NGN interoperability, and providing service capabilities, such as presence and availability, real-time charging and messaging, VPN, and number portability into the IMS/NGN environment. The ISP segment offers unified communication by allowing subscribers to access messages, such as voice, video, email, fax, and SMS messages through any device. This segment also provides flexible real-time charging, which allows service providers to charge various ISP events, such as pay-per-view, video-on-demand, and premium content services. The Fixed-Mobile Convergence segment offers value-added services based on a common service platform environment for fixed and mobile services, enabling service providers to offer personalized and mobility-aware service bundles to residential and business users. The Mobile segment provides customized mobile services to residential and business users based on a real-time and network-independent service platform. The company has operations in Australia, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, Central and South America, and the Asia/Pacific. eServGlobal was founded in 1991 and is based in Sydney, Australia.
